pages.title: Item Outputs
pages.text: You can use the convenyor belts to extract and transfer items from here

pages.title: Item Inputs
pages.text: Like the output, you also can use to transfer and insert items to here

pages.title: Fluid Input
pages.text: From your fluid pump, transfer your water or any kind of fluid into this face

pages.title: Redstone Panel
pages.text: To turn on/off we can put the lever on it and turn the lever on = Machine Turned Off, and vice versa !

pages.title: Power Input
pages.text: All the machines will ONLY take power from here
